discussion.author: CohenCyril
discussion.comment:
> I fixed a typo and copy-pasted forgotten files from MathComp-Analysis

I created https://github.com/math-comp/tools to avoid duplication of code. I think we should remove the ad-hoc copies in both math-comp and analysis repositories

tags.description: PR which is not rebased: check the target is appropriate (generally master) and rebase on top of it.
